message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can call it a day!
You're starting strong, but I'm not going to let you get away with it that easily!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Time to make a deal!
You think you're getting the better deal, but I'm not convinced yet!
Time is running out, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not backing down yet!
Last chance, Bob. Meet me halfway and we can both walk away with something!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
This is getting ridiculous. I'll give you the majority, just please end this!
You're almost out of options, and I'm not giving in!
Fine, I'll take the scraps. Just end this already!
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel now. I'm not impressed!
